attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament and hold a general election immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parliament has been dishonoured and disgraced by the current members and as such we, the British people, must demand the right to end this session and hold a general election at the earliest opportunity

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
